string-array.name: studylist_part1
string-array.item: A,boy,girl,man,woman\n一个,男孩,女孩,男人,女人
white,black,red,green\n白色,黑色,红色,绿色
good morning,afternoon,evening,night\n早上好,下午好,晚上好,晚安
young,old,beautiful,handsome\n年轻的,老的,美丽的,英俊的
tall,short,thin,fat\n高的,矮的,瘦的,胖的
mother,father,brother,sister\n母亲,父亲,弟弟(或哥哥),妹妹(或姐姐)
this,that,these,those\n这个,那个,这些,那些
wife,husband,son,daughter\n妻子,丈夫,儿子,女儿
He,She,I,It\n他,她,我,它
what,who,which,whose\n什么,谁,哪一个,谁的
when,where,why,how\n什么时候,什么地方,为什么,怎么样
uncle,aunt,family,parents\n叔叔,阿姨,家庭,父母
my,your,his,her\n我的,你们的,他的,她的

string-array.name: studylist_part1_content1
string-array.item: [bɔɪ],[ɡɜ:l],[mæn],[\'wʊmən]#男孩,女孩,男人,女人#boy,girl,man,woman#study_every
[bɔɪ],[ɡɜ:l],[mæn],[\'wʊmən]#男孩,女孩,男人,女人#boy,girl,man,woman#Practice_FourInOne
一个男孩,一个女孩,一个男人,一个女人#a boy,a girl,a man,a woman#Practice_ReadAfterMe
他是一个男孩,她是一个女孩,他是一个男人,她是一个女人#he is a boy,she is a girl,he is a man,she is a woman#Practice_Translate
他是一个男孩,她是一个女孩,他是一个男人,她是一个女人#he is a boy,she is a girl,he is a man,she is a woman#Practice_SpeakAfterMe

string-array.name: studylist_part1_content2
string-array.item: [waɪt],[blæk],[red],[ɡri:n]#白色,黑色,红色,绿色#white,black,red,green#study_every
[waɪt],[blæk],[red],[ɡri:n]#白色,黑色,红色,绿色#white,black,red,green#Practice_FourInOne
白色,黑色,红色,绿色#white,black,red,green#Practice_ReadAfterMe
白色,黑色,红色,绿色#white,black,red,green#Practice_Translate

string-array.name: studylist_part1_content3
string-array.item: [ɡud \ˈmɔ:niŋ],[ɡud ˌɑ:ftə\ˈnu:n],[ɡud \ˈi:vniŋ],[ɡud nait]#早上好,下午好,晚上好,晚安#good morning,good afternoon,good evening,good night#study_every
[ɡud \ˈmɔ:niŋ],[ɡud ˌɑ:ftə\ˈnu:n],[ɡud \ˈi:vniŋ],[ɡud nait]#早上好,下午好,晚上好,晚安#good morning,good afternoon,good evening,good night#Practice_FourInOne
早上好,下午好,晚上好,晚安#good morning,good afternoon,good evening,good night#Practice_ReadAfterMe
早上好,下午好,晚上好,晚安#good morning,good afternoon,good evening,good night#Practice_Translate

string-array.name: studylist_part1_content4
string-array.item: [jʌŋ],[əʊld],[\ˈbju:tɪfl],[\'hænsəm]#年轻的,老的,美丽的,英俊的#young,old,beautiful,handsome#study_every
[jʌŋ],[əʊld],[\ˈbju:tɪfl],[\'hænsəm]#年轻的,老的,美丽的,英俊的#young,old,beautiful,handsome#Practice_FourInOne
年轻的,老的,美丽的,英俊的#young,old,beautiful,handsome#Practice_ReadAfterMe
年轻的,老的,美丽的,英俊的#young,old,beautiful,handsome#Practice_Translate

string-array.name: studylist_part1_content5
string-array.item: [tɔ:l],[ʃɔ:t],[θɪn],[fæt]#高的,矮的,瘦的,胖的#tall,short,thin,fat#study_every
[tɔ:l],[ʃɔ:t],[θɪn],[fæt]#高的,矮的,瘦的,胖的#tall,short,thin,fat#Practice_FourInOne
高的,矮的,瘦的,胖的#tall,short,thin,fat#Practice_ReadAfterMe
一个高个子男人,一个矮个子女人,一个瘦的女孩,一个胖男孩#A tall man,A short woman,A thin girl,A fat boy#Practice_Translate
一个高个子男人,一个矮个子女人,一个瘦的女孩,一个胖男孩#A tall man,A short woman,A thin girl,A fat boy#Practice_SpeadAfterMe

string-array.name: studylist_part1_content6
string-array.item: [\'mʌðə(r)],[\'fɑ:ðə(r)],[\ˈbrʌðə(r)],[\'sɪstə(r)]#母亲,父亲,弟弟(或哥哥),妹妹(或姐姐)#mother,father,brother,sister#study_every
[\'mʌðə(r)],[\'fɑ:ðə(r)],[\ˈbrʌðə(r)],[\'sɪstə(r)]#母亲,父亲,弟弟(或哥哥),妹妹(或姐姐)#mother,father,brother,sister#Practice_FourinOne
我的母亲,他的父亲,我的弟弟(或哥哥),她的妹妹(或姐姐)#My mother,His father,My brother,Her sister#Practice_ReadAfterMe
这是我母亲,那是他父亲,这是我弟弟(或哥哥),这是她妹妹(或姐姐)#This is my mother,That is his father,This is my brother,That is her sister#Practice_Translate
这是我母亲,那是他父亲,这是我弟弟(或哥哥),这是她妹妹(或姐姐)#This is my mother,That is his father,This is my brother,That is her sister#Practice_SpeakAfterMe

string-array.name: studylist_part1_content7
string-array.item: [ðɪs],[ðæt],[ði:z],[ðəʊz]#这个,那个,这些,那些#this,that,these,those#study_every
[ðɪs],[ðæt],[ði:z],[ðəʊz]#这个,那个,这些,那些#this,that,these,those#Practice_FourinOne
这是,那是,这些是,那些是#this is,that is ,these are,those are#Practice_ReadAfterMe
这是一本书,那是一个苹果,这些是书,那些是苹果#This is a book,That is an apple,These are books,those are apples#Practice_Translate
这是一本书,那是一个苹果,这些是书,那些是苹果#This is a book,That is an apple,These are books,those are apples#Practice_SpeakAfterMe

string-array.name: studylist_part1_content8
string-array.item: [waɪf],[\'hʌzbənd],[sʌn],[\ˈdɔ:tə(r)]#妻子,丈夫,儿子,女儿#wife,husband,son,daughter#study_every
[waɪf],[\'hʌzbənd],[sʌn],[\ˈdɔ:tə(r)]#妻子,丈夫,儿子,女儿#wife,husband,son,daughter#Practice_FourinOne
他的妻子,她的丈夫,我的儿子,你的女儿#His wife,Her husband,My son,Your daughter#Practice_ReadAfterMe
这是他的妻子,那是她的丈夫,这是我的儿子,那是我的女儿#This is his wife,That is Her husband,This is my son,That is my daughter#Practice_Translate
这是他的妻子,那是她的丈夫,这是我的儿子,那是我的女儿#This is his wife,That is Her husband,This is my son,That is my daughter#Practice_SpeakAfterMe

string-array.name: studylist_part1_content9
string-array.item: [hɪ],[ʃɪ],[aɪ],[ɪt]#他,她,我,它#He,She,I,It#study_every
[hɪ],[ʃɪ],[aɪ],[ɪt]#他,她,我,它#He,she,I,It#Practice_FourinOne
他,她,我,它#He,She,I,It#Practice_ReadAfterMe
他是一个男孩,她是一个女孩,我很好,这是一本书#He is a boy,She is a girl,I am fine,It is a book#Practice_Translate
他是一个男孩,她是一个女孩,我很好,这是一本书#He is a boy,She is a girl,I am fine,It is a book#Practice_SpeakAfterMe

string-array.name: studylist_part1_content10
string-array.item: [wɒt],[hu:],[wɪtʃ],[hu:z]#什么,谁,哪一个,谁的#what,who,which,whose#study_every
[wɒt],[hu:],[wɪtʃ],[hu:z]#什么,谁,哪一个,谁的#what,who,which,whose#Practice_FourinOne
什么,谁,哪一个,谁的#what,who,which,whose#Practice_ReadAfterMe
这是什么?,下一个是谁?,哪一个?,这些书是谁的?#What is it?,Who is next?,Which one?,Whose books are these?#Practice_Translate
这是什么?,下一个是谁?,哪一个?,这些书是谁的?#What is it?,Who is next?,Which one?,Whose books are these?#Practice_SpeakAfterMe

string-array.name: studylist_part1_content11
string-array.item: [wen],[hwɛə],[waɪ],[haʊ]#什么时候?,什么地方?,为什么?,怎么样?#when,where,why,how#study_every
[wen],[hwɛə],[waɪ],[haʊ]#什么时候?,什么地方?,为什么?,怎么样?#when,where,why,how#Practice_FourinOne
什么时候?,什么地方?,为什么?,怎么样?#when,where,why,how#Practice_ReadAfterMe
第一节课是什么时候？,学校在哪里？,为什么不？,你今天好吗?#When is the first class?,Where is school?,Why not?,How are you today?#Practice_Translate
第一节课是什么时候？,学校在哪里？,为什么不？,你今天好吗?#When is the first class?,Where is school?,Why not?,How are you today?#Practice_SpeakAfterMe

string-array.name: studylist_part1_content12
string-array.item: [\'ʌŋkl],[ɑ:nt],[\ˈfæməli],[\'peərənts]#叔叔,阿姨,家庭,父母#uncle,aunt,family,parents#study_every
[\'ʌŋkl],[ɑ:nt],[\ˈfæməli],[\'peərənts]#叔叔,阿姨,家庭,父母#uncle,aunt,family,parents#Practice_FourinOne
约翰叔叔,贝蒂阿姨,我的家人,我的父母#Uncle John,Aunt Betty,My family,My parents#Practice_ReadAfterMe
这位是我叔叔,那是我阿姨,那是我家人,他们是我父母#This is my uncle,That is my aunt,That is my family,They are my parents#Practice_Translate
这位是我叔叔,那是我阿姨,那是我家人,他们是我父母#This is my uncle,That is my aunt,That is my family,They are my parents#Practice_SpeakAfterMe

string-array.name: studylist_part1_content13
string-array.item: [maɪ],[jɔ:],[hɪz],[hə(r)]#我的,你们的,他的,她的#my,your,his,her#study_every
[maɪ],[jɔ:],[hɪz],[hə(r)]#我的,你的,他的,她的#my,your,his,her#Practice_FourInOne
我的,你的,他的,她的#my,your,his,her#Practice_ReadAfterMe
我的名字,你的姓是?,他的父亲,她的母亲#My first name,Your last name i?,His father,Her mother#Practice_Translate
我的名字,你的姓是 ?,他的父亲,她的母亲#My first name,Your last name is?,His father,Her mother#Practice_SpeakAfterMe
